column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Absolutely amazing. Ideal if you want to bring the romance
column2: it is very classy and dimly lit throughout. But it's the food that earns them the 5 stars. We started with the steak frites
column3: which has a side sauce that tastes kind of caramelly but not sweet
column5: up there with the best in the city. No joke. For the sake of variety
column6: we also shared the spiced fried chicken with mashed potatoes. Oh yes. This is fried chicken taken to the next level
column7: extremely flavorful. We were fighting to savor instead of devour it immediately.
